title: Completed PE Summary - Anne Marie
raw_html:
Category Fishing vessel
Date 07/01/04
Location of incident: off the North East of England
Incident Type: Flooding
Injuries/ fatalities: None

Synopsis

Flooding of FV Anne Marie off the North East coast of England.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector made the following recommendation to the owner/skipper of the vessel:

  • Equip vessel with a liferaft
